div.p: If the PHA system (or its intermediary) identifies an issue with the eICR, but is still able to process the file, or If the incoming eICR was not processed by the PHA system (or its intermediary), the code will identify the warning or error reason.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.114222.4.5.274
CodeDisplay
TEMP_CODE_EICR_FATALeICR was not processed due to an error of: fatal problem with the eICR that was received
TEMP_CODE_EICR_SERVEReICR was not processed due to an error of: an ongoing server problem
TEMP_CODE_SIGNIFICANT_CONTENTeICR was not processed due to an error of: significant content or format issues
TEMP_CODE_INVALID_IDeICR was processed with the warning of: invalid eICR identifier
TEMP_CODE_REQUIRED_DATA_MISSINGeICR was processed with the warning of: required data not found
TEMP_CODE_CONTENTeICR was processed with the warning of: content or format issues
TEMP_CODE_INACTIVE_RCTCeICR was processed with the warning of: inactive RCTC code
TEMP_CODE_OUTDATED_RCTCeICR was processed with the warning of: outdated RCTC version

description.value: If the PHA system (or its intermediary) identifies an issue with the eICR, but is still able to process the file, or If the incoming eICR was not processed by the PHA system (or its intermediary), the code will identify the warning or error reason.

display.value: eICR was not processed due to an error of: fatal problem with the eICR that was received
eICR was not processed due to an error of: an ongoing server problem
eICR was not processed due to an error of: significant content or format issues
eICR was processed with the warning of: invalid eICR identifier
eICR was processed with the warning of: required data not found
eICR was processed with the warning of: content or format issues
eICR was processed with the warning of: inactive RCTC code
eICR was processed with the warning of: outdated RCTC version
